### Species distribution modeling

One pillar of wildlife research is understanding how wildlife populations are arranged on the landscape. The field of research concerned with how wild animals are distributed in space and time, and how those distributions relate to environmental characteristics like habitat type, temperature, and human impacts is called *species distribution modeling*.
